amendment.description: To establish a demonstration project under the Medicaid program to encourage the provision of community-based services to individuals with disabilities.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 991 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 247.

Amendment SA 991 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S8347-8348) To establish a demonstration project under the Medicaid program to encourage the provision of community-based services to individuals with disabilities.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 991 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 247.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 991 proposed by Senator Harkin.
